EmailTemplate.subject: Join us at the 1st UIC Future Railway Mobile Communication System
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Join us at the 1st UIC Future Railway Mobile Communication System (FRMCS) Conference Experience how your rail business can travel at the speed of life Dear {{lead.First Name}},
As a leader in the railway industry, the first UIC FRMCS conference <[[https://events.uic.org/uic-global-frmcs-conference-2019]]> will provide you with a comprehensive view of railway communications technology, standards and their operational impact. At this inaugural event, Nokia would like to share with you the new capabilities 5G will bring to our railway industry, and how you can achieve the maximum benefits of 5G and the digital transformation of your railway. 1ST UIC FRMCS CONFERENCE, May 14 - 15, 2019 - UIC Headquarters, Paris, France Join Nokia for the following engaging presentation:
Session 5: The Engagement Industry – Benefits of 5G evolution for FRMCS <[[https://events.uic.org/uic-global-frmcs-conference-2019#Pre-Programme]]> Wednesday, 15 May, 11:00-12:15 Michael Klöcker, Head of Railway Solution Management, Nokia
Railway operators are facing key challenges to keep their operations safe, on time and to make train travel more attractive. Further digitalization is required for the introduction of services as enhanced Train Control, ATO, passenger services or the use of sensors for various purposes. In this session learn how ultra-reliable telecommunication networks can help you address the challenges. We look forward to seeing you at the conference sessions in Paris. If you would like to get in touch with a Nokia railway expert, please contact your local sales representative here <[[https://networks.nokia.com/industries/railways/travel-at-the-speed-of-life#mktoForm_2241]]>.
Best regards, The Nokia Railway solutions team For further information about Nokia railway solutions, visit https://networks.nokia.com/industries/railways/travel-at-the-speed-of-life <[[https://networks.nokia.com/industries/railways/travel-at-the-speed-of-life?&did=d000000001kk&utm_campaign=railcritcomm_dg&utm_source=email-list-frmcs&utm_medium=email&utm_content=event&utm_term=invitation]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
